name: Super Monster Madness
description:
The game is a 2D platformer, hardcore shooter, split-screen, local co-op, racing game. I made it in about a week for a college project. Enjoy.

Controls:

Player 1 Keyboard - "wasd", "Spacebar".

Player 2 Keyboard - "arrow keys", "Shift".

Or

Gamepad - "Left Stick/D-pad", "A", "Right trigger", "Left Trigger"

"ESC" = Menu

"Enter" = Fullscreen
